Interface VirtualServer

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RMIServer, VirtualServerSocket
public interface VirtualServer extends Remote
Interface for the VirtualServer, which extends Remote to allow RMI communication. It provides methods for connecting clients, handling user input, and managing game state.
